ygData.subject: Re: Planes Raids
ygData.msgSnippet: You shouldnt have toi deal with an anti ranger bias. Ranger with the right equipement are some of the best Damage dealers in the game as far as
ygData.messageBody:
You shouldnt have toi deal with an anti ranger
bias. Ranger with the right<br>equipement are some of
the best Damage dealers in the game as far as
melees<br>go. Just make sure to have a dealer handy. On each
server, there are raid<br>groups. Usually comprised of
medium and small guilds who cannot raid alone<br>with
their guilds. Talk to some of the large guilds || or
High levels in<br>smaller guilds and get the name and
website of the raid group. There should<br>be
applications on the website and dates when all the raids are..
Good luck<br>to you.<br><br>Slyde Windsaber - Norrath
Knight Guild<br>53 Pathfinder<br>Elder in the Ring of
Steel Raid Group - Rallos Zek
